entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9628] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of -95,235 reported in the network role http://ssolarbankcorp.com/role/SummaryOfFinancialInformationForSubsidiariesOfNon-controllingInterestsDetails, http://ssolarbankcorp.com/role/StatementsOfIncomeLossAndComprehensiveIncomeLoss should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of -3,358 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://ssolarbankcorp.com/role/SummaryOfFinancialInformationForSubsidiariesOfNon-controllingInterestsDetails. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2023-07-01 to 2024-06-30 Dimensions : Unit : CAD Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : 0 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : 0 Rule version: 26.0.9 - ex99-4.htm 5973

property.name: label
property.value: Total comprehensive income for the year attributable to NCI
